channel.title: Edge4PK~~Dice~~pking~~boss
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Edge4PK[/shadow][/size][/b]
Welcome to Edge4pk!!
This is a PI based pking server!
we have fully working bosses/quests, and minigames!
100% accurate pking and switching!
working dragon claws spec and spirit shield effects!
some pretty nice donator gear (no spoilers here :p)
donator zone/staff zone
many places to pk!
DICING!
a nice pkp exchange
a pking SKILL! "get kills to level it up!"
and much much more!
-----pictures----- Working dice!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img717/292/diceu.jpg[/img]
Earn points just for being online and use them for rewards!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/8706/activitys.jpg[/img]
Just some teleports we have for right now! more to come!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img687/9144/teleports.jpg[/img]
Extremes in the shop for those of you who wish to pk right away!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img72/6278/extremes.jpg[/img]
added PvP armours with correct stats!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/4527/pvparmour.jpg[/img]
PkP shop with items that arent too pricey!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img821/6050/pkpshopb.jpg[/img]
Boss with rare loots and a chest for a little extra reward!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img705/8908/bossht.jpg[/img]
Our cool looking client ;)
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img266/5697/clienty.jpg[/img]
shows the leaders in PKP not including the staff members :)
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img7/2833/highscoresd.jpg[/img]
-----client-----
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93536668/Edge4Pk%20Client.rar
-----Forums-----
http://edge4pkv2.createaforum.com [/center]

item.title: Edge4PK~~Dice~~pking~~boss
item.dc:creator: @pl0xz-pker pl0xz-pker
item.description:
@pl0xz-pker wrote:

Nice leach, I’ve seen this source before and you just used the name of the source and never bothered to change anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Edge4PK~~Dice~~pking~~boss
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

Fails:

it depends on what you mean by ‘good’. every fucking sever contains the same over-used content. be unique/created. brainstorm.

see thats what i told the kid who helped me find a source…all these sources are over used and basically the only good servers are written from scratch…i need a dev team i cant do this all myself -.-

Read full topic
